Package ca.caro.assetmanagement.database

Class ImportHandler

java.lang.Object
ca.caro.assetmanagement.database.ImportHandler
public class ImportHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Import Handler Class

Class that handles interaction between database and the imported spreadsheet data. It involves processing the parsed json string to Asset object, and perform SQL base on the object attributes.

  • Method Details

    • json_to_object

      public static int json_to_object​(java.lang.String json_string) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Convert the string that is in json format into Asset_Entity_From_Import object. the object is processed outside of the method, and the result is passed to method in Asset Handler class to perform SQL. the SQL would INSERT new entry in asset table. The method will return the total number of entry inserted to the asset table.
      Parameters:
      json_string - the string in json format
      Returns:
      the total number of entry inserted to the asset table.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown when a thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied,

    • setAssetParams

      private static java.lang.String[] setAssetParams​(Asset_Entity_From_Import asset)
      Read from an Asset_Entity_From_Import object and extract information from it, the information together with extra parameters is returned as an array of String, each item in the array contains one of the details of the asset
      Parameters:
      asset - asset
      Returns:
      array of String containing necessarily information for INSERT into asset table

    • getAssetBrand

      private static java.lang.String getAssetBrand​(java.lang.String brand_name)
      Get the Brand id base on given brand name, the value is retrieved by connecting to database and performing SQL
      Parameters:
      brand_name - the name of brand which the method used to look for brand id
      Returns:
      the brand id.
